unnormalised: Boro, mhazo ixtt Rahul Linear Algebra porikshek lagun khubuch ghabarlo. Tannem rati 11 vazta mhaka phone kelo ani 3x3 matrixacho inverse sodo divnk sanglo. Distai, tacho Prof. Sharma-n tankam sqrt(2) ani pi/4 ashi aslo problem dila! Hanvem tankam sanglam, “Bhai, shant rav! Tuka Chandrayaan-4 kitle distensacher vochot te kaddche nant. Tannem Gauss-Jordan elimination vaprun dekh...vo konnak tori bribe divn karun ghe!” Tankam bore disona. Mhaka aasha asa to pass zatlo mhunn. Na zalear tankam Goa plans prepone korche podtle.
normalised: Okay, mhunnlle mhonnlle, mhozo ixtt Rahul Linear Algebra porikshek lagun khub ghambortaalo. Tannem raatchea eleven vaajta mhaka phone kelo ani tin by tin matrix-achem inverse kaddpak bhayan bhorson ulo marlo. Dislle, tacho Professor Sharma-n taka square root of two ani pi divided by four ashem dista tem ek bhirantachem problem dilem! Hanvem taka sanglem, "Bhai, thondd rav! Tem Chandrayaan-four khatir tujem trajectory calculate korche bhaxen na. Fakt Gauss-Jordan elimination vapar...vo borem zalear konnak tori laanch di, zaka hea vishayant zannvai asa!" Taka hanso ailo na. Aasha asa to pass zatlo. Na zalear taka tache Goa-che plans poilim korche podtle.
